      void Battlefield.attack(Division d1, Division d2, int location)
      attack Division 1 and Division 2 attack each other Here are certain rules that apply First the damage output of each division is calculated( number of units in division * the strength of 1 unit *0.2(if the other division has a weakness against this one)) Then we drop the HP(Health) of each division by that damage.
